name: Gregg Horton, Web Developer
body:
## Gregg Horton

![that's me!](https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/682680?s=460)

My name is Gregg Horton and i'm a web developer living in Oakland, CA. My specialties are Ruby, Rails, Javascript, and Backbone.js. I also have extensive experience working with servers, doing QA and release management. You can find me as Greggawatt most places on the internet. 

## Recent Projects
###[Reedly.io](http://www.reedly.io)
An open source RSS reader written in rails and backbone.js. A spiritual clone of Feedly.
![Reedly.io](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greggawatt/greggawatt.github.io/master/images/home.png?raw=true)


###[Towers Of Hanoi](http://greggawatt.github.io/TowersOfHanoi-JQ/)
An implementation of a towers of hanoi game written in Javascript.
![Towers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greggawatt/greggawatt.github.io/master/images/towers.png?raw=true)


###[Tic Tac Toe](http://greggawatt.github.io/TicTacToe-Jquery/)
A TicTacToe Game for 2 players written in Javascript. 
![TicTacToe](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greggawatt/greggawatt.github.io/master/images/tictactoe.png?raw=true)


###[Rails Rapid Transit](https://github.com/greggawatt/RailsRapidTransit)
An implementation of a rails like web server written in ruby.

## Contact
Email me at [greggahorton@gmail.com](greggahorton@gmail.com)

Also check me out on [linkedIn](www.linkedin.com/in/greggawatt/)

You can checkout some of my more artistic and musical exploits at [greggawatt.com](http://www.greggawatt.com)
